function popupCenter(url, title, w, h) { // Fixes dual-screen position Most browsers Firefox var dualScreenLeft = window.screenLeft != undefined ? window.screenLeft : screen.left; var dualScreenTop = window.screenTop != undefined ? window.screenTop : screen.top; var width = window.innerWidth ? window.innerWidth : document.documentElement.clientWidth ? document.documentElement.clientWidth : screen.width; var height = window.innerHeight ? window.innerHeight : document.documentElement.clientHeight ? document.documentElement.clientHeight : screen.height; var left = ((width / 2) - (w / 2)) + dualScreenLeft; var top = ((height / 2) - (h / 2)) + dualScreenTop; var newWindow = window.open(url, title, 'scrollbars=yes, width=' + w + ', height=' + h + ', top=' + top + ', left=' + left); } }; //Show VA Chat var MOBILE_DEVICE_SCREEN_WIDTH = 767; $scope.mobileDevice = c.data.isMobile || ($(window).width() < MOBILE_DEVICE_SCREEN_WIDTH); $scope.showChat = $scope.mobileDevice; $scope.toggleChat = function () { $scope.showChat = !$scope.showChat; $('a#va_chat').toggleClass('inactive-chat active-chat'); if($scope.showChat && $('div.conversation-region.open').length<=0){ $scope.$$postDigest(function(){ $('div.conversation-button-container button.help-button').trigger('click'); }); } }; $scope.openPopUp = function() { var url; var queue_id; if ($scope.data.queueType == "connect") { queue_id = $scope.data.connect_support_queue_id; } if ($scope.data.isCSPPortal && $scope.data.live_agent_only) { url = "com.glideapp.servicecatalog_cat_item_view.do?v=1&sysparm_id=2bd27963fc241300964fabc2fdf10ea4&sysparm_preview=true&sysparm_domain_restore=false&sysparm_stack=no&sysparm_queue_id="+queue_id; } var popup = window.open (url, "chat_popup", "width=450, height=600"); }; c.openSignLogin = function () { $location.url('?id=community_login'); }; $scope.openLogin = function () { $scope.modalInstance = $uibModal.open({ template: '

}; $scope.showCommunitySupportProfile = function() { return $scope.portal.url_suffix === "community" && $scope.data.enableSupportProfile; }; $rootScope.$on('sp.avatar_changed', function() { $scope.userID = ""; $timeout(function(){ $scope.userID = $scope.user.sys_id; }); }); $scope.isHomepage = function() { if (!$scope.page.id) return true; if ($scope.page.id == $scope.portal.homepage_dv) return true; return false; &:hover { background-color: #fff; } } .unified-menu-popover { border-bottom: 5px solid $pe-enhanced-header-divider-color; } // Navbar .navbar { margin-bottom: 0px; border: none; } .navbar-default .navbar-toggle { margin-top: 9px; left: 0; } } .navbar-collapse { flex: auto; } .unified-menu-flex-container { margin-bottom: -5px; display: flex; flex-wrap: nowrap; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center; align-content: center; border-bottom: 5px solid $pe-enhanced-header-divider-color; } .navbar-container { width: 100%; } @media screen and (min-width: 768px) { .navbar-container { padding-left: calc(50vw - 375px); padding-right: calc(50vw - 375px); } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .nav>li>a { padding-right: 0.5rem; padding-left: 0.5rem; } } // top icon logo .navbar-brand { height: 40px; padding: 0; } .navbar-brand img, .navbar-brand span { margin-left: 1rem; margin-right: 1rem; display: block; max-height: 36px; position: relative; top: 50%; color: $navbar-default-link-color; -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%); -ms-transform: translateY(-50%); transform: translateY(-50%); } // second logo .navbar-brand-logo > img { margin-top: $sp-logo-margin-y; margin-bottom: $sp-logo-margin-y; max-height: 70px; max-width: 200px; max-height: $sp-logo-max-height; max-width: $sp-logo-max-width; // commented out because it messes with the calculation for menu icons //margin-left: $sp-logo-margin-x; //margin-right: $sp-logo-margin-x; } @media screen and (max-width: 767px) { .navbar-brand-logo > img { margin-left: $sp-logo-margin-x; margin-right: $sp-logo-margin-x; } } .breadcrumb-container { background-color: $panel-bg; } .navbar-header.is-mobile { margin-top: 2px; } .navbar-header.is-mobile .navbar-action-search { display: table; } .navbar-header.is-mobile .navbar-action-search { margin-top: 8px; } .navbar-global.is-mobile .navbar-nav { display: block; } .navbar-action-icon { padding-right: 10px; color: $navbar-default-link-color; } .navbar-action-login { padding-top: 20px; padding-bottom: 20px; } .navbar-action-login-mobile { margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; h4 { font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; color: $navbar-default-link-color; width: 100% } a { display: block; } } .navbar-nav>li>a.navbar-user-profile-dropdown-link, .navbar-action-icon { color: $navbar-default-link-color; &:hover { color: $navbar-default-link-hover-color !important; } } .navbar-nav > li.open > a.navbar-user-profile-dropdown-link { color: $navbar-default-link-hover-color !important; } .navbar-nav > li > a { color: $navbar-default-link-color; } .navbar-global .navbar-action-search { display: table; .input-group { padding-bottom: 0px; input[name="q"] { width: 270px; border-color: $text-muted; border-radius: 3px; float: right; color: $text-color; } ul.dropdown-menu { min-width: 110%; a.ta-item { line-height: 20px; font-size: 14px; white-space: normal; i.ta-icon, span { display: table-cell; } span { vertical-align: top; } } } span.input-group-btn { float: left; button { background-color: inherit; border: none; color: inherit; outline: none; margin-right: 10px; padding-top: 8px; } } } } /* for mobile app */ .navbar-default.is-native { background-color: #405060; } .navbar-collapse { padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 0px; } .navbar-top, .navbar-top + .clearfix { background-color: $brand-primary; } .navbar-collapse.collapsing > .navbar-header, .navbar-collapse.in > .navbar-header { border-bottom-color: #fff; } @media screen and (max-width: 767px) { .navbar-header { border-bottom: 5px solid $sp-navbar-divider-color; background-color: $csm-secondary-header-bg; height: 88px; display: flex; flex-wrap: nowrap; } } @media screen and (min-width: 767px) { .navbar-login { max-width: 250px; } } .navbar-global ul.dropdown-menu { border-color: $csm-navbar-global-user-profile-dropdown-border; padding: 10px 0; padding-right: 0px; box-shadow: none; } .navbar-global .navbar-user-profile-dropdown-menu a { line-height: 23px; color: $link-color; } .navbar-primary ul { padding-left: $sp-logo-margin-x; line-height: 16px; } .navbar-primary ul.dropdown-menu { margin-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 15px; padding-right: 10px; } .navbar-primary .navbar-left>ul.navbar-nav>li:first-of-type>a { padding-left: 0px; } .navbar-default .navbar-nav>.open>a, .navbar-default .navbar-nav>.open>a:hover, .navbar-default .navbar-nav>.open>a:focus { background-color: inherit; } .nav-bar-separator-pipe { margin-top: 10px; height: 30px; border: 1px solid #979797; } .csm-nav-bar-separator-pipe { border-color: $csm-navbar-separator-color; } .navbar-nav>li>a.navbar-user-profile-dropdown-link { padding-top: 42px; padding-bottom: 42px; } .navbar-nav>li>a { padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; } .navbar-global.is-mobile .navbar-nav { margin: 0px; } .navbar-global.is-mobile .panel-heading, .csm-unified-mobile-menu .panel-heading, .navbar-global.is-mobile .navbar-nav>li>a, .navbar-global.is-mobile .csm-unified-panel .panel-body>div, .unified-mobile-header-menu-level3 .panel-body>div { padding-top: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px; padding-left: 20px; padding-right: 20px; } .navbar-global.is-mobile .panel-body, .csm-unified-mobile-menu .panel-body { background-color: $panel-bg; color: $text-color; padding: 0px; } .navbar-global.is-mobile .panel-group .panel-heading+.panel-collapse>.panel-body, .csm-unified-mobile-menu .panel-group .panel-heading+.panel-collapse>.panel-body { border: none; } .navbar-global.is-mobile .panel-body, .csm-unified-mobile-menu .panel-body { color: $navbar-default-link-color; } .unified-mobile-header-menu-level1-link a { color: $navbar-default-link-color; } .navbar-global.is-mobile .panel-group .panel+.panel { margin-top: 0px; } .active-chat { color: $color-lightest !important; } .inactive-chat { color: $color-light !important; } .link-align { text-align: center; margin: 0 auto; border-top: 1px solid #E6E8EA; padding-top: 10px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: -10px; padding-bottom: 10px; } .notif-badge { position: absolute; top: -3px; right: 10px; font-size: 60%; } .dropdown-menu-line { min-width: 20em; } .dropdown-menu>li>a { white-space: nowrap; padding: 6px 20px; color: $link-color; } .dropdown-menu>li>a:hover, .dropdown-menu>li>a:focus { text-decoration: underline; background-color: inherit; color: darken($link-color, 15%); } .navbar-primary.navbar-align-content { justify-content: space-between; } .head-search { display: flex; flex-wrap: nowrap; padding-top: 20px; padding-bottom: 20px; background-color: #d6d6d6; width: 100%; .input-group { width: 100%; } input { width: 100%; height: 50px; display: block; font-size: 18px; border-radius: 0; border: 3px solid transparent; padding: 0 10px; &:focus { z-index: 2; } } .input-group-btn > button { height: 50px; margin-left: -45px; border: none; background: transparent; } .input-group-btn > button > i { font-size: 24px; color: $navbar-default-link-color; } } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .head-search { padding: 10px 0 10px 10px; } } .head-search > div { flex: auto; } .head-search > span { margin: auto 10px; color: $navbar-default-link-color; font-size: 32px; flex: 0 0 32px; align-self: center; } .mobile-search { right: 50px !important; font-size: 20px; color: $navbar-default-link-hover-color; sys_update_xml.payload: customc.unified-menu-popover { background-color: #fff; border-left: 1px solid #d6d6d6; border-right: 1px solid #d6d6d6; //border-bottom: 5px solid #046B99; position: absolute; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); z-index: 1000; padding: 0; visibility: hidden; } .unified-menu-popover > div { display: grid; grid-template-columns: auto auto; text-align: left; } .unified-menu-popover > div > div { border: 3px solid #fff; padding: 15px; //background: #F5F9FB; &:hover { //background-color: #fff; } } .unified-menu-popover-image { float: left; margin-right: 10px; img { max-height: 70px; } } .unified-menu-popover-title { margin: 10px; font-size: 18px; a { color: $navbar-default-link-hover-color; } a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } } .unified-menu-popover-body { margin: 10px; color: $navbar-default-link-color; } .unified-menu-popover > div > div > a > img { height: 77px; float: left; margin-right: 10px; } .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem > a:hover { & + .unified-menu-popover { visibility: visible; } } .unified-menu-popover:hover { visibility: visible; background-color: #F5F9FB; } .unified-menu-flex-container { display: flex; flex-wrap: nowrap; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center; align-content: center; } .unified-menu-list-item { flex: 1 1 auto; //background-color: #FFCCCC; position: unset; } .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem { color: $navbar-default-link-color; text-align: center; } .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem > a { padding: 25px 0 0; min-height: 50px; display: block; //color: $pe-enhanced-header-icon-color; &:hover, &:focus { //color: $pe-enhanced-header-icon-hover-color; } } .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem > a > span.fa { font-size: 32px; } .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem > a::after { background-color: transparent; content: " "; height: 5px; width: 100%; display: block; &:hover::after, &:focus::after { //background-color: $brand-primary; } } .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuText { color: $navbar-default-link-color; font-weight: 400; } .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem:focus, .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem:hover { color: $navbar-default-link-hover-color; text-decoration: none; .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuText { color: $navbar-default-link-hover-color; } } /* popover */ .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem .popover > .arrow { display: none; } .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem .popover > .arrow:after { // border-bottom-color: $csm-navbar-popover-background-color; border-bottom-color: $panel-bg; } .unifiedMenuPrimaryMenuItem .popover { //box-shadow: 0 2px 4px 0 $csm-navbar-popover-box-shadow-color; font-family: inherit; margin-top: 0 !important; top: 92px !important; border-radius: 0; border-bottom: 5px solid #046B99; border-left: 1px solid #d6d6d6; border-right: 1px solid #d6d6d6; // background-color: $csm-navbar-popover-background-color; background: #F5F9FB; .popoverText { // color: $csm-navbar-popover-text-color; } .popover-separator-line { border-bottom: 1px solid $text-muted; padding-bottom: 7px; width: 125% margin-bottom: 10px; border-color: #E6E8EA; min-width: 100px; } .popoverHeader h5 { margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; } .popoverCsmHeader { color: $text-color; // color: $csm-navbar-popover-separator-text-color; } .popover-content { padding-left: 30px; padding-top: 20px; padding-bottom: 30px; padding-right: 30px; letter-spacing: 1px; } .popoverSubItem1 { padding-top: 13px; white-space: nowrap; } .popoverSubItem2 { padding-top: 13px; } .popoverItemSeparator { padding-top: 12px; color: $text-muted; } .popoverMenu { .popoverContent { display: table-row; } .popoverContentColumn { display: table-cell; padding-right:50px; white-space: nowrap; } [class~='popoverContentColumn']:last-of-type { padding-right: 0px; } ul { padding-left: 0px; } } } .csm-unified-mobile-menu span.fa { color: #9fc7da; margin-right: 8px; } .csm-unified-mobile-menu .unified-mobile-header-menu-level3-item { border-bottom: 0.5px solid #828890; border-color: $csm-navbar-panel-separator-color; border-radius: 0px; } .unified-mobile-header-menu-level3-item h4 { padding-left: 20px; } .csm-unified-mobile-menu .panel-body li { list-style-type: none; } .unified-mobile-header-menu-level3 .panel-heading h4 { cursor: default; } .unified-mobile-header-menu-level3 .panel .panel-heading, .unified-mobile-header-menu-level3-item { padding-left: 40px; sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_theme"><sp_theme action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css_variables>/* Enhanced Header */
$sp-logo-margin-y: 15px;
$sp-logo-max-height: 92px;
$sp-logo-max-width: 200px;

$navbar-default-bg: #f8f8f8 !default;
$navbar-default-link-color: $brand-primary !default;
$navbar-default-link-hover-color: darken($brand-primary, 6.5%) !default;

$pe-enhanced-header-icon-color: $navbar-default-link-color !default;
$pe-enhanced-header-icon-hover-color: $navbar-default-link-hover-color !default;
$pe-enhanced-header-divider-color: $sp-navbar-divider-color !default;
$pe-enhanced-header-divider-hover-color: $brand-primary !default;
$pe-enhanced-header-menu-item-bg: $navbar-default-bg !default;</css_variables><footer/><footer_fixed>false</footer_fixed><header display_value="Enhanced Header">4697281fdb880c109310fa56bf961992</header><name>Enhanced Header Sample Theme</name><navbar_fixed>false</navbar_fixed><sys_class_name>sp_theme</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>trevor.roberts</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-25 14:18:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>665af926db0048109310fa56bf961995</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Enhanced Header Sample Theme</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_theme_665af926db0048109310fa56bf961995</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>trevor.roberts</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-01 14:49:26</sys_updated_on></sp_theme></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_c5763d88db9040509310fa56bf96193b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>enhancedHeaderMenuDeviceType</name><script><![CDATA[function($window) {
		var cache = {};
		
		function isHandHeld(){
			if(cache.isHandHeld === undefined) {
				if( navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)
					|| navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone/i)
				|| navigator.userAgent.match(/webOS/i)
				|| navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone/i)
				|| navigator.userAgent.match(/iPod/i)
				|| navigator.userAgent.match(/BlackBerry/i)
				|| navigator.userAgent.match(/Windows Phone/i)) {
					cache.isHandHeld = true;
				} else {
					cache.isHandHeld = false;
				}
			}
			return cache.isHandHeld;
		}
	
	    function isSmallScreen() {
				if ($window.matchMedia) {
					var mm = $window.matchMedia('(max-width: 767px)');
					if (mm) {
						return mm.matches;
					}
				}
				
				var dpr = 1;
				if ($window.devicePixelRatio)
					dpr = $window.devicePixelRatio;
				if (angular.element($window).width() / dpr < 768)
					return true;
				
				return false;
		}
		
		return {
			isMobileView: function () {
				//Below Function is commented since we can't decide device size based on os. So isSmallScreen function handles checks required for screen size.
				/*if(isHandHeld())
					return true;*/
				if(isSmallScreen())
					return true;
				return false;
			}
		};
	}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>trevor.roberts</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-30 05:52:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>c5763d88db9040509310fa56bf96193b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>enhancedHeaderMenuDeviceType</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_c5763d88db9040509310fa56bf96193b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>trevor.roberts</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-30 05:52:14</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>
